review_text: This recipe was absolutely delicious! I made it for my family and they loved it. I'll definitely be making it again.
This recipe was good, but it was a little bit too spicy for me. I would recommend using less chili if you dont like spicy.
This recipe was okay, but it wasn't anything special. I've had better Bangladeshi food at restaurants.
This recipe was so easy to follow and the results were amazing! I'm not the best cook, but I was able to make this dish look and taste like it was from a restaurant.
I really enjoyed this recipe! It was flavorful and satisfying, but it didn't take too long to make. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a delicious and easy Bangladeshi dish.
This recipe is a keeper! It's so easy to make and the results are always delicious. I've made it for friends and family gatherings and everyone loves it. I highly recommend it!
